html:
Eight lives, eight deaths: the other American boys who died on the same day

  • Kenneth Mills-Tucker

    19, Indianapolis, 3.13am: drive-by shooting

  • Stanley Taylor

    17, Charlotte, North Carolina, 4.17am: shot outside a convenience store

  • Pedro Cortez

    18, San Jose, California, 4.22pm: suspected gang-related shooting

  • Edwin Rajo

    16, Houston, Texas, 7.15pm: shot in error by a friend

  • Samuel Brightmon

    16, Dallas, Texas, 11pm: shot walking with a friend

  • Gary Anderson

    18, Newart, New Jersey, 1am: shot in a case of mistaken identity

  • Tyshon Anderson

    18, Chicago, Illinois, 11.05pm, gang-related shooting

  • Gustin Hinnant

    18, Goldsboro, North Carolina, 3.30am, shot by a stray bullet
headline: The Guardian
trailText: Latest news, sport and comment from the Guardian
